answers.answer: Ideally you should take it between 24-28 weeks but gestational diabetes is serious if left untreated or unmanaged so they will test you for it...if you have it and don't know you won't know what you need to do-- like check your sugars, change eating habits,  etc and baby could be very large or have heart or other problems...

title: is taking a glucose test to late at31 weeks??
